nodes.text: The FA-5 valet droid was a model of bipedal droid produced by SoroSuub. It was the successor of the FA-4 pilot droid.

Such droids served as valet droids, taking luggage and directing recently arrived beings to waiting SoroSuub airspeeders piloted by FA-4 models. Several served at the docking bays of the Republic Executive Building during the Clone Wars.
